settingsSaved.description: Confirmation message when settings are saved successfully

aboutDescription.message: Tired of the mediocre functionality of the default tab management? Then switch to the powerful and flexible MyTabSearch extension – you'll be amazed! MyTabSearch is a Chrome extension that helps you quickly search and switch between your open tabs. With a simple keyboard shortcut, you can access all your open tabs and find the one you need in seconds.
aboutDescription.description: Description text for the about page

featuresHeading.description: Heading for the features section on the about page

featureSearchTabs.message: Quickly search through all open tabs

tipShortcutKey.message: The shortcut key to bring up the tab list is Ctrl+Shift+A.
tipShortcutKey.description: Tip about the main shortcut key

tipPrevTabShortcut.message: The shortcut key to quickly switch to the previously opened tab is Ctrl+Shift+S (since v1.6.0).
tipPrevTabShortcut.description: Tip about the previous tab shortcut key

tipShortcutConflict.message: If the default shortcut keys fail to work, a key conflict may be the cause. You can adjust them manually in chrome://extensions/shortcuts.

tipPinExtension.message: For a smoother user experience, it is recommended to pin the extension to the browser toolbar directly after installation.
